column4: anyone know how to figure out which repo is causing this? W: GPG error: http://ppa.launchpad.net intrepid Release: The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY C5E6A5ED249AD24C
post the contents of /etc/apt/sources.list file at http://paste.ubuntu.com
you have to: 1) update the links to the PPA archives you use (they have an extra 'ppa') and 2) get the key for each of them
I can give you a hand with the updating if you want to
that would help, where does the extra ppa go?
http://pastebin.com/m444cf2d8 - you can get it with: sudo wget http://pastebin.com/pastebin.php?dl=m444cf2d8 -O /etc/apt/sources.list
the ppa links you have now will be dropped soon
yes, that's step (2) I mentioned before
you have to update the keys for these: http://paste.ubuntu.com/112076/plain/
okay, when will the old ones stop working?
those are the links you have to visit with your browser
yah okay, they are all like http://ppa.launchpad.net/project/ppa/ubuntu
I have no idea when they will end the old links, this is the email I got: http://paste.ubuntu.com/112078/plain/
